channel.title: Katagon - #464/#530 | Real HD | Fullscreen | Multiple gameframes
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/x7K3OO8.png[/img]
[B]IMPORTANT:[/b] Katagon was released on December 27th, we are a brand new server so if you log in to find a low amount of players do not be discouraged! We also encourage you to report all bugs and/or post suggestions for content you'd like to see added.
[B]Website: [/B][url=http://www.katagon.com]Katagon - RuneScape Private Server[/url] [B]Play: [/B][url=http://www.katagon.com/downloads/katagon.jar]http://www.katagon.com/downloads/katagon.jar[/url]
[youtube]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=N1zzVJn63Uo&feature=youtu.be[/youtube]
Upon starting your client you may choose your settings: [img]http://i.imgur.com/tGewmwY.png[/img]
Login with any username and your forum account will automatically be created: [img]http://i.imgur.com/ZiHM8Ib.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/ERrHhBP.png[/img]
Play in HD or LD: [img]http://i.imgur.com/gHlK4AB.png[/img]
Change various settings in-game, such as hitmarks(474, 554, 634), OpenGL HD or Software rendering, fullscreen/resizable, new hp bars, x10 hits and more: [img]http://i.imgur.com/90fyyPN.png[/img]
Experience our realistic combat system: [img]http://i.gyazo.com/b2fa15693edea79f5aec175cea53533b.gif[/img]
Mine shooting stars as they land across the world: [img]http://i.imgur.com/1m2Tx3C.png[/img]
Complete multiple mini-quests: [img]http://i.imgur.com/ivcLheF.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/NdtsyUi.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/RQFUU8n.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/DtqObPr.png[/img]
Open your achievement diary and collect Achivement points for rewards: [img]http://i.imgur.com/IU682cZ.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/W9y0uKD.png[/img]
[SPOILER=Fullscreen Media] Fullscreen in HD: [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ciPwfX1.jpg[/img]
Fullscreen in LD: [img]http://i.imgur.com/GqewMAV.png[/img]
Resizable: [img]http://i.gyazo.com/316b0554983dc1f2e307c181ae659d74.png[/img] [/SPOILER]
[/CENTER]

item.title: Katagon - #464/#530 | Real HD | Fullscreen | Multiple gameframes
item.dc:creator: @Konceal Konceal
item.description:
@Konceal wrote:

[quote=“Soulcist, post:2, topic:548773”]Oh mah God… that forum is gorgeous. The server itself looks wonderful and seems to have a lot of potential I’d like to think. I might actually give this a try.

P.S. It’s not the 28th.[/quote]

My bad Wrote the thread in preparation for tomorrow but posted early. Fixed it.

[quote=“wimstr, post:3, topic:548773”]This looks amazing. :eek:
Will check this out for sure.[/quote]

Thanks, hope to see you online!

Read full topic
